title: CSE 5913 - Capstone Design: Computer Animation
description: Capstone design project: conceptual and technical design and implementation of computer animation incorporating animation elements; teamwork, written and oral communication skills.Prereq: 2501 (601) or 5501, and 3901 (560) or 3902 or 3903, and 3541 (581) or 5541 (683). Not open to students with credit for 682.
